headline: Slovak Extremist Gets 4 Years in Prison Over Neo-Nazi Symbols
text: BRATISLAVA, Slovakia — A Slovakian court has sentenced the country’s leading neo-fascist politician to more than four years in prison after he used a well-known neo-Nazi symbol.
snippet: Marian Kotleba, the head of a neo-fascist political party, was convicted of spreading an ideology aimed at suppressing democratic rights and freedoms.
